name: Leak.sx Group Leader Toolkit
tagline: A toolkit to help group leaders manage their groups
body:
### About
This is a userscript that was developed for group leaders on a website known as [Leak.sx](http://leak.sx) who easily want to manage their group. The current group management page is a bit... Under-featured.

### How to Install
* Install either need [Greasemonkey for Mozilla FireFox](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/) or [Tampermonkey for Google Chrome](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/tampermonkey/dhdgffkkebhmkfjojejmpbldmpobfkfo?hl=en)
* Visit https://github.com/IRDeNial/LSX-GroupToolkit/raw/master/grouptoolkit.user.js to install the userscript.
* Visit the normal group management page (**managegroup.php?gid=**)

### Want to contribute?
Clone the repository and once you're done, create a pull request and I'll review what you have and look into adding your code!  Just visit the [GitHub Page](https://github.com/IRDeNial/LSX-GroupToolkit) and go from there!

### Userscript Source
[Source can be found here](http://github.com/IRDeNial/LSX-GroupToolkit/blob/master/grouptoolkit.user.js)

### Screenshots
![Main page](http://i.imgur.com/UMrODhO.png)
![Member List](http://i.imgur.com/JXKYJsN.png)
![Leader List](http://i.imgur.com/LXAr7Ba.png)
![Add Member Form](http://i.imgur.com/93baoL7.png)
![Remove Member Form](http://i.imgur.com/f4m8Xoy.png)

### Authors and Contributors
@IRDeNial

### Support
Having trouble with this script?  Feel free to [create an issue](https://github.com/IRDeNial/LSX-GroupToolkit/issues) on the GitHub page and I'll get back to your ASAP.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
